Class Critic

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Client
        • Critic
  • public class Critic
extends Client
    Critic will not only pay, but will also change the star rating of the restaurant. Critic pays more than Customer. Images from https://iconscout.com.
    Version:
    2 (14/05/2020)
    Author:
    Raymond Zhang
